author: dapplion
content: RE `engine_getBlobsV1` question to ELs: would you consider some flag or parameter to tune block production algo to only include blob transactions that check some heuristics that increase the chance that they are properly propagated through the network? i.e. only include blob txs that have been seen for at least X seconds

author: chfast
content: Our input to the BLS `g1msm` gas prices: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-2537-bls12-precompile-discussion-thread/4187/81
